title: So this just happened...
body:
Tried to gift my friend some RP so he can make a server transfer, for I am a generous god, went into the gifting center, chose the friend, chose the RP gift option, and then pressed "PURCHASE RP" because I thought that's what's required before you can "SEND RP".
Atleast it seemed logical at the time.
Well, nope.
Now I've got 3250 RP on an account I don't even play on cause I've changed servers and this is more of a joke account, and my friend doesn't have his gift, AND we still can't play together.
Sad times all around, already sent a ticket to support but I think I already know how that's gonna end.

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a ticket, it'd be best to wait for their response so that they can help you out there. As long as none of the 3250 RP has been used, we should be able to get that straightened out for you!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
